summary: Teaches the move Dark Pulse, a special Dark-type attack with 80 power, 100% accuracy, and a 20% chance to make the target flinch.
typical_users: Pokémon needing coverage against Psychic and Ghost types (e.g., Gengar, Volcarona)
Pokémon utilizing flinch chance with Serene Grace (e.g., Togekiss)
